definition: "hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
variant of 閹|阉[yan1]/to castrate/variant of 淹[yan1]/to delay
to conceal/to hide behind/to cover up
to cover up/to conceal/to mask/to gloss over
to cover/to mask/to cover up or conceal (the truth etc)
hidden from view/alternately hidden and visible/setting off each other
to fool people (idiom)/to pull the wool over people's eyes
lit. to cover one's ears whilst stealing a bell/to deceive oneself/to bury one's head in the sand (idiom)
lit. a blemish does not obscure jade's luster/the pros outweigh the cons (idiom)
to make a surprise attack/to pounce on (an enemy)

sentences.english: The roles have now been reversed, with semi-clad westerners as objects of curiosity on African beaches.
sentences.chinese: 骚胸半掩的西方人在非洲海滩成为焦点。

sentences.english: Finally closing his book, with a bang of the ponderous cover.
sentences.chinese: 这一次，小门并未被砰然关闭，而是被礼貌地掩上。

sentences.english: And in five minutes more she shut it up.
sentences.chinese: 过了五分钟她掩上了书。

sentences.english: Spirits cabined and confined by winter expanded like matted cotton wadding fluffed out again.
sentences.chinese: 被冬天枷锁了的灵魂，和被束掩的棉花一样舒展开来。

sentences.english: Candle flowers cover the small screen long.
For me, it’s just plain good.
sentences.chinese: 对我而言，质朴中难掩美味。

sentences.english: So even pointing out their hypocrisy becomes a form of hypocrisy.
sentences.chinese: 因此，即使指出他们的虚伪也难掩自身贩虚伪。

sentences.english: Up to the door goldsmith sleep alone, it is more every cold night.
sentences.chinese: 门掩金铺独自眠，那更逢寒夜。

sentences.english: I opened the door quietly, then stood in the door way in clouded moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 我悄悄打开门，在云掩的月光下站在门口。

sentences.english: Gulong show that the pearl of heaven cover interest and support of the Mindanao Mindanao Bosma.
sentences.chinese: 那古龙戏珍珠之趣和撑掩苍天的峨峨博冠。

sentences.english: Rolled-hard, Cloud flow impact from the Qing.
sentences.chinese: 浪卷光难掩，云流影自清。

sentences.english: Hi Tim euro family "novice" but conceal the difficulties the euro nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 欧元区大家庭喜添“新丁”却难掩时下欧元之困。

sentences.english: I got my fingers caught in the door.
The media for their folly to question the imperial palace fee?
sentences.chinese: 媒体质疑故宫为掩丑事给封口费？

sentences.english: "on the latch" meant the door was closed but not locked.
sentences.chinese: 不落锁“的意思是掩上门，但不锁住。

sentences.english: Dusk falls and the cuckoo is silent;
sentences.chinese: 杜鹃无语正黄昏，荷锄归去掩重门。

definition: to cover up (a shortcoming)/to screen off/to hide/to conceal
variant of 喧[xuan1]/old variant of 諼|谖[xuan1]
to chant/to recite/to moan/to groan/cry (of certain animals and insects)/song (ancient poem)
lit. woodcutter's family/humble background/poor family background
to hold back/to restrain/to control (oneself)/to collect/Taiwan pr. [lian4]
